name: TypedParameterResolver
documentation:
Abstract base class for {@link ParameterResolver}s that resolve parameters based on type matching.

This class provides a default {@link #matches} implementation that checks whether the expected type of the parameter is assignable from a configured base type. @param the message or context type used for resolution (e.g. {@code HasMessage}, {@code Object}, etc.)

fields.name: type
fields.documentation:
The base type this resolver applies to.
 Only parameters that are assignable from this type will be considered.

methods.name: matches
mayApply
methods.documentation: Determines whether this resolver may be applicable to the given method or constructor.
